content: Waited almost for a year to write a review and I am as speechless now as I was back then. Words won't suffice to do justice to GRIS; an absolutely breathtaking, beautiful, majestic masterpiece. Won't go into any details because GRIS deserves to be savored, not spoiled. All I want to do is thank Conrad Roset and everyone over at Nomada Studio and Berlinist Band for taking us on this once in a lifetime journey. Eagerly waiting for your next projects and collaborations. Lots of love. And thank you.
Mobile version is garbage. Can't jump high enough. I want a refund because this game is far from relaxing and made me extremely angry. Almost angry enough to freaking smash my phone.

A gorgeous game with breathtaking art and music. The ending gave me chills. Gris is a bit different in the sense of you can't actually die and there is no fail screen, though you might get stuck on some of the puzzles. Personally, I love Gris and am happy to say that I got all the achievements and momentos. The art and music was simply divine perfection. I definitely recommend trying Gris out.

Unfortunately controls took up almost half of the phone screen and kept wanting to stop here and there. Sucks because I did enjoy the other half I could see of the artwork. If you want to play this game I recommend playing with headphones as the game suggests because without them you will barely hear any music.
highly recommend to y'all. best game

Breathtaking, moving, gorgeous, and darn near perfect. The visuals and music are among the greatest of any indie game I've ever played. But I have to subtract a star for the overall gameplay, which is repetitive, and especially for the frustrating controls on this phone port. Frequently your character fails to jump as they're running, since touch screen technology often won't allow 2 pressing motions to occur at once. I'd imagine this is better on a console. Still a fantastic game.
So so great game and without wifi so this is a bonus
Beautiful and intriguing, but I can't get past the controls and lack of controller support. Would love to actually play it if that's added, but I had to refund it for now.

One of the best mobile games I've ever played in my life. The controls are simple but perfect for the story and direction of this game. The Visuals are stunning, they are a masterpiece and I'm not exaggerating. Playing it was like watching colours unravel all over in a new world The music and sound direction... Perfect (no words necessary) One of the few mobile games to make me shed a tear. It is worth your money.
This. Game. Is. Terrible. I couldn't see the screen through the tears in my eyes. It's awesome!!! The story, music, and colors made me cry so much. The gameplay is also awesome!!!!!

Visually breathtaking! The soundtrack is masterfully done and fits this game perfectly. The controls are spot on smooth and perfect. I can hardly believe this game is sold so cheaply here. It's good enough to be a $50 console game to say the least. I recommend this game for all ages. Truely a one of a kind diamond! Thank you so much for making this game as it is easily now one of my absolute favorites. Can we expect a sequal? Please?
Controls make the experience a nightmare... The graphics and the story are outstanding.

Beautiful game, fun to play, I actually jumped a few times with the eel and the Bird LOL. The different powers she gained were so cool. I loved it! I was sad when it was over! Thank you for creating such a masterpiece.
Super fun . I never thought this game is so satisfying and rewarding .
We really need more game like this 😊
Finished this game. I had one of the best time playing this game. Visuals, music, everything is brilliant. Kudos to all the creators.
One of the best games ive ever played. Truly a gem within a sea of bad. The art style was amazing, but so was the concept. 10/10 game.
crashes so much its unplayable

Game is absolutely beautiful. Runs a little rough on my nvidia shield - completely fine and playable, just not a smooth 60FPS - which is a shame because the visuals and soundtrack are excellent. Would be nice to be able to appreciate them fully. Great experience, more than worth the money. Worth using a controller for.
Besides the already amazing artwork it's honestly got a good story and simple gesture controls, honestly didn't want it to end hope there's a sequel!!!
10 stars! AMAZING GAME!

Something up with the controls on Samsung Galaxy S20+ (SD865) with current firmware. I could only walk left, not right. It's a shame because it's a really beautiful looking game having looked at the reviews. I'll get it on PlayStation instead.

Excellent game... hits all the nails. It's an amazing casual game to play. But far far beyond that, it is cinematic intriguing. It feels strangely open world even though it's a platformer. You never feel forced into a path...wvwm though obviously it's a maze. The graphics are stunning and the sound track plus effects are phenomenal. The currently playing this with no controller. But that is on the way. I'd recommend this game to everyone, including grandma! This game is in a class of its own!!!
Art

As beautiful as the beginning of this game is, it is tediously slow gameplaywise. Fortunately the gameplay does get better past that point. Now don't get me wrong, it is still very much a game that you play for its art direction and touching "story". Gameplay, here, is just a vessel for what the game has to offer, it is decent but that's about it. If you're OK with that, this game is a beautiful piece of art well worth experiencing.
Amazing, 100% worth the five dollars. Gorgeous watercolor style illustrations and ambient music. The story walks you through the five stages of grief.
Fantastic! Beautiful scenery, amazing gameplay and story! I'm amazed by everything and can't stop taking screenshots of this masterpiece!

Art reminded me of french animations of the 70's (Belladonna of Sadness, etc...). It's just beautiful, as is the story. It's a fun puzzle/actioner that presents a challenge but isn't too difficult. I can't recommend it enough.
This game is art.

Absolutely incredible. The graphics are incredible and the story line is beautiful. Would definitely recommend too people who like medium hard puzzles. I love everything about this game its so well done thank you for the experience. It's definitely worth buying! ❤

A visually stunning game ruined by lousy controls. The developers say this is supposed to be a game free of frustration. Well, sorry to say this was one of the most frustratingly difficult games I've ever tried. Not because it's difficult per se, but because of the unpolished and imprecise controls, lack of direction and poor level design. What makes it worse is that it's unforgiving towards your mistakes, forcing you to slowly retrace your steps if you make just one misstep.
Inside of just a few minutes this game overtook Tiktok on the list of reasons to pick up my phone while at the same time it rose towards the top of the list of reasons to throw my phone at the wall.

So, I was playing the game, having a wonderful time. Then, my screen turned black and it kicked me out of the game. Now, it always does that. It usually happens during the first 'boss' or when Gris gets to the Blue stage of the game.
One of the best games I have played. Artistic, creative, curious.

I love this game on Switch, hate it on mobile. Where are the controls? Instructions? Hints? How do I even get her to WALK?! All she does is sit!! And I would really love to turn OFF the sound so I can hear my audiobook playing in the background. I'm annoyed!!
Beautiful music & visuals. Very short game play though. I was done in 3 days, playing about an hour or so each day. I would love more. Especially being the first game I've ever paid for.
Beautiful!
Outstanding!

Beautiful visual and auditory journey through grief and loss. Challenging but worth it if you persist and are patient learning controls. Stunning visuals and story of 4 chapters, and you get a new ability each chapter! Loved it.

Beautiful artwork, I just love this game. My only problem is with my own preference in controls im not a huge fan of touch screen because I have big fingers. And i dont know if its controller compatible.
This game is an absolute marvel. The further I reach the more beautiful it gets. Controls can be somewhat challenging sometimes.
Impossible to control and now i can't get my money back. Don't waste your time
Beautiful game, calming and fun to play. Controls a little difficult but once you get to grips with it you're away

It's really pretty and I'd love to keep playing it but the app keeps glitching or will shut off when I get to a certain area. The controls are a little wonky but you get used to them. I just wish it would stop shutting off!
Blew me away.
I was expecting this release since long time ago! Probably one of the prettiest games I've ever played. Great job Nomada Studio, never stop making games.
Beautiful adventure. Reminds me that games are also a form of the art.

Beautiful graphics and somewhat intrigued story, but to name the game serene is a huge stretch. For me it was extremely frustrating. I agree with other about difficult controls - not responsive enough, especially when you need to move in graphics in millimeters sizes (in some places the pictures are so tiny that you do movements in blind).
No controller support = no thanks
The game is beautiful and the soundtrack is perfect! But the controls need to be fixed or reworked, if the controls get sorted this game will be flawless!
Still at the beginning..so far, great artwork and music but difficult controls (needs a proper tutorial).. will update when played through..
Beautiful game. The graphics are amazing. It's like playing in a watercolor painting and the puzzle are challenging but not frustrating. Absolutely breathtaking game.

Really amazing art and design. Loved the concept and exploring. Really have to use all of her abilities throughout the story or you'll end up stuck. Some parts it takes patience and persistence but is worth it if you are into simple story games. It is a slow game so if you aren't into slow games, you probably won't like GRIS. I loved it. Great job to the creators of GRIS. I hope you make more games similar to this.

beautiful but frustrating. I finished this game on pc before and even then the controls were finicky (I guess it was made for controllers) but it's even more unreliable on mobile. unfortunate, it's such a moving and beautiful experience otherwise
A beautiful experience. Do yourself a favor and play this on a bigger screen.
It would take you away!+
I play it with an Xbox controller. This game it's just WOW!

A wonderful platformer, beautiful artwork, but the controls on mobile are difficult and it keeps freezing right after gaining the jump power in Green :( I'd love to keep playing but I can't. Please fix this!!!
I don't get the game. All the girl does is drop down to the ground. Not sure what the game is about. I am exhausted and bored after the first 5 minutes. Waste of money :-(
Amazing game
Impressive. Creation of such detailed and well balanced animations must have taken enormous amount of time.

The animation and music are absolutely beautiful but the controls are so finiky that I'm starting to really hate this game. The area I need to tap to move backwards and forwards changed constantly! It's near unplayable. A lot of the time my finger is basically of the screen over my camera to get her to move. Please fix this I would love to update my review and be able to play a game I paid $7 for 😠
This is art.
Bought on pc and needed to play on the go as well, such a good game!
Absolutely love this game.
Ne demek vurup hissi yok o z(a)man bu kalp ağrım neden?

i completed the game itsssssss AMAAZING ! IT FELT LIKE YOU GOT INSIDE MY BRAIN AND DESIGNED A GAME EXACTLY HOW I WISH .. I LOOOVE YOU !! TO the ppl who built this your hands/brains are precious ! i'll support you forever 💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜🌼🌼🌼🌼🌼🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🍒🍒🍒🍒🍒🍒🍒🍭🍭🍭🍭🍭🍭🍭💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛

The art is extraordinary. The action part is at first boring but as the story advances the character can gain more moves. The screen size is for PC, so the character is very tiny in the play with my smartphone.
Will not play on my LG Stylo 5. I loved the game when I played it on a computer so I wanted it for my phone. I'm very disappointed.

A beautiful game but unfortunately it's crashing for me when playing on a Samsung tablet at a save point on the green level. I've tried all the usual fixes. I would rate this five stars if not for this problem!
Photo.
Very beautiful game!
This one proves that games are art!
Beautiful, happy to finally have it on mobile.
The game is good but how about make it work with controller maybe it will be good
Don't buy this game if you intend to play it on your phone. The controls are horrid and frustrating, especially in the water level. The game looks beautiful, but it's hard to tell on a 5.5" screen.
It did not work at all. It's too bad. I love this game on PC.
Very cleverly made. Each scenario different. Love this game when it flows, but when the time frame is too tight. I really want to smash my phone. "Warning"!! Do not play if you have no patience....
Best game in Play Store
Controls are simply too frustrating to bother playing. No joy in being constantly looping same scene due to the near poor controller.
A fine artistic experience
I love the art style, music, and the great story telling that is going on. Definitely worth the five dollars.
Very creative. Smoke a bowl and play this you'll have a great time. Even after the story is complete you can re-visit chapters and collect all the little easter eggs(lights).
Masterpiece.

Simply beautiful! The art, the gameplay and the meaning behind this is wonderful! Even though I have not lost a loved one like my mother or father, this game still made me so emotional! A beautiful game! The nomada studio did a marvelous job! A piece of art! Bless those souls.

My game keeps crashing fix it or give me a refund. It's a shame because I really enjoy the little bit that I was playing but now when I go to turn it on and continue my home screen pops up all the time like I said fix it or somehow give me a refund this is not fair
The game is frustrating on a phone, you find yourself endlessly jumping and repeating to the point of annoyance.
Amazing game with gorgeous artwork and music. Runs and looks great on my Note 20 Ultra. Thanks for making this a premium title!
The graphics in this game are gorgeous, the levels are interesting, and I have a hard time putting it down. Very glad I started it.
As this is a mobile port, the controls are jarring at times, and the Gameplay could benefit from some more direction, however subtle, but a good overall experience.
Love! Definitely worth the 5 bucks! Beautiful puzzle game with a mesmerizing soundtrack! Some puzzles can be a little difficult but nothing that frustrates you to the point of deleting
I'm sure the game is great, but I don't think it works on mobile (at least, with its current controls)
Is there a fix or patch in progress for the chashes of the game?.
This games release on mobile had me sell my Switch!
It is a good game. Graphics and music are obviously the strongest point in the game. However, I dont like the controls, which are especially annoying in water environment.
Exceptional a seamless master piece!
This game has redefined the gaming experience for me. I can't even count the number of times I have recommended it to people.

I kinda want to say it's amazing but the crashing is to much for me I feel like I cant play this game cause of it.... it's a wonderful game. Absolutely stunning but the fact that it doesn't work for my phone makes me upset...

As much as I–want–to enjoy this game, it is not designed or optimized for mobile phones, so go into it with that in mind. The art direction is beautiful and the music really is great, even if the whole "this game is art" is kinda in your face. I find myself wanting to relax and enjoy the game and environments, but having to plan my simple platforming a full second or so before I do it can be frustrating, especially when the margin for error in some sections is small, and frankly- frustrating.
It is one of the most beautiful game in regards to both visual and music and it is one of my favorite game.
Game crashes at the bird area no matter what I do... Would ba an amazing game if you could play it.

Best game ever! The amazing music complements the stunning art, it's an experience! Almost like watching a film, it's slick, meaningful, incredibly detailed and unlike anything I've played before! Does recommend!
Gorgeous designs, attention was given to details and the background music is so soothing.
I have loved the game so far but I've reached the bird chase scene and the game keeps crashing so I can't play any further :/
This isn't a game, this is ART!!!
Magnificent and beautiful of a game.
Excellent
great game .beautifully designed. awesome and relaxing soundtrack. highly recommended
This game is beautiful to play, and is just difficult enough to give you a little bit of a challenge. Really enjoying it so far and im not even very far into it yet, good job!
I love so much.. the animation , art , gameplay .. i love it..
Strange .... Uniquely adventure
So damn tricky and beautiful.
Beautiful
It's meant for fans of games like journey
One of the most beutiful games i have ever played!!
This game was wonderful and calming. The artwork is magnificent and the storyline was subtle but still very powerful, it is more than worth it.
This is not just a game, this is art
This game is like unlike any I've played before, the atmosphere, the style, the story, all brilliant. Hope they make more of this genre, an amazing piece of art and craftsmanship.

This is more or less a game, but a work of art. I bought this game on the Nintendo Switch, and once i heard that it was coming to mobile, I had to get it. The artsyle, music score, and themes are beautifully crafted and the gameplay is easy to understand, along with the platforming. You have to really explore and look at all the fine details so you know where to go and what to do. Amazing game overall!
this game is a masterpiece. ive never seen such a wonderful and colorful story

When art and gaming fields combine, there's magic. Visually stunning, each and every frame of the game. Amazing sound by Berlinist🤘and attention to details in puzzles and action scenes is just superb 😍
It's a masterpiece.
it's just beautiful, just lacking a bit more optimization, but it's perfect from there.
Such an amazing game with relaxing and moving stories.
Great! Beautiful game..

I never playes these type of games but this game was just, Wow the details and the sounds and music the water colors is just so beautiful, i did not think i would like it but after playing for just 5 minutes i really started to enjoy it alot . Inwould recomend this game to any one who is willing to try something new peaceful beautiful and humorus and puzzles that dont feel like a road block and or a chore.
Love love love this beautiful game. I've been wanting to play this for a while now and I'm totally amazed with how beautiful it is. The visuals and soundtrack make such amazing art .

Beautiful graphic and concept buttt it doesn't have any kind of guide to play so for some it will be very confusing and bc of that you might end up using a guide/walkthrough from other players, i ended up refunding (glad i still can cause it's quite pricey in my currency ) i didn't enjoy it and the reason is what i stated before: not very beginners/non-gamer friendly.

I'm playing this on my android, it was going good until the bird part happened its started to glitch and kick me out I would try again and again but, it would glitch in the same area each time, I thought It was my phone but it wasn't. Please fix it, it's such a good game so far I would really hate for it to be ruined just by that one error or so.
Bought it to support the devs! Changed my life!
One, if not the best mobile game I have ever played. The visuals and the music are absolutely incredible.
I love the graphics and game machinery, but I would give it 5 stars if it stop crashing. Particularly, in the forest temple where you get attacked by the giant bird made of black butterflies.

The game itself is breathtaking. Love the colors and artwork and the music is delightful. However the crash just after meeting the terrifying Birds has most of us upset. Please let me be there soon so we can continue with the lovely game. 😁

userName: SODS South African Okes Do Stuff
content: The art style in this game is fantastic. I was a little apprehensive to buy the game after I had heard about it (shout out to the Falcon from Gameranx), but I am very glad I did. This is a very captivating and beautiful experience from start to finish and the music really carries you through the story. Great work developers.

It's a beautiful game, soundtracks are amazing and the graphics are easy on the eyes but it's a shame that it crashes. I have tried everything (re-install, clear cache, data) but it stil freezes at the same spot, it has become a little disappointing.

This game captivated me from start to finish. The sound and art are godly. A lot of effort went into making the game, I can tell. The only issue/complaint I have is that it feels like the mechanics don't work quite right. Like jumping. Like, one second I can jump to a square but then next time i try I can't. This was especially true when trying to climb the pink tree. It took me over an hour to do it because the jumping mechanic wasn't consistent

This is an amazing game. You can basically stop anywhere in the game, and can change it to your wallpaper. Most of the negative reviews come from people who haven't finished the game and gave up when they couldn't figure out what to do. Though I do admit that the path might not always be clear, just look up a walkthrough and you'll be fine. Plus the ending gives you a rollercoaster of emotions that almost makes you want to cry. This is an astonishingly austounding experience.

Firstly i had seen this is on steam. Then i wanted to buy on it. And play firstly the way is design is mind blowing. The color and illustration and graphic design everything is awesome. But kind of playing in mobile little bit has to observe more clearly. So if anyone wanted to play this game. I prefer play it on pc or any console cuz it puzzle game you need to pay attention. Finally learnt in this to never give up on character.
This game is a wonderful experience to play.. it's so therapeutic.. thanks for transferring this gem to android 🥰
This one is the best and most beautiful game. Thank you!

It is an absolutely stunning game and an amazing journey. However, as soon as I got to yellow, half way through the cutscene it lags and the game crashes. I tried everything I could think of to get it to work but nothing helped. I don't think it has anything to do with my phone either considering that I have plenty other large detailed games that perform just fine.

I love this game, but I've reached a point where the app crashes every time. I know what I'm supposed to do in the game, but every time I play and try to get further, the app crashes at that same point and forces me to start from my last save point. It's an endless cycle and has made progressing further in the game impossible. I've tried deleting the cache, the data and force stopping the app but nothing works.
لعبه فياضه بالمشاعر

Gris can more accurately be described as art. The music and sound are both immersing and enthralling, bringing a deeper emotional connection to the world. The visuals are a painting come to life with a journey to lead you on an unforgettable adventure. Truly unforgettable experience.
I love the game
Probably the most beautiful game that I've played. Recommend it to everyone.

Beautiful game, but art taking precedence over gameplay makes it a bad platformer. Frame drops are noticeable too. A few places are extraordinarily boring. Not worth the full price, I regret buying a 3 hour game for this much money.

Doesn't work on my OnePlus 7T Pro. I can launch the game, alow the file use, then game logs to the Google Play, but I can see only white stripe with white noise on my screen. Previously worked on LG G6+, but not too stable and unfortunately my LG is dead now. Please help me to launch it on 7t pro. 1 star review just to attract dev's attention, I will change it when I will be able to play. Thanks!
An enhanced, new age, metroidvania inspired masterpiece.

Istg why this game is so underrated, this is the most beautiful game I ever play legit you can screenshot anywhere and there you go gorgeous wallpapers. The control is really simple it's easy to understand love the puzzle game as well. I play in my samsung A30 so the frame rate it's kinda down in some place but it's just a very tiny minor thing overall it's still good! I don't really know with the plot but it's already make me cry the scenery the music every elements of it really touch my heart.
Great game would love to finish it but it crashes and stops playing when the blue square plant imitates the heavy ability crushing the pillar. Please help, I really want finish this game.

It's a really beautiful game, but the controls are so delayed that it makes it impossible to jump onto where you need to be. It makes me sad 😭. I really like this game but with the delay it makes it unplayable. If the developer would be able to fix that somehow I would gladly play it again!!!

I am not a gamer. I heard so much about this that I gave it a try. Got to part 3 or 4, but gave up in frustration. I found some of the required moves very difficult to pull off, and eventually stopped playing after trying HUNDREDS of times to make one particular jump. I watched 3 different people make the jump easily in 'walkthrough' videos, but I think it's much harder if you don't have the muscle memories from playing tons of games before.
It's wonderful to experience such beautiful game in your life.

Play this game. Not only is the metaphorical storyline meaningful and enlightening, the sound design and visuals are beyond stunning. There's no spoken words, but simply playing through the game allows one to walk with Gris on her journey to overcome her fears and her depression as she fills her world with color once again. - 10/10, would play again
Such a beautiful tear dropping experience for me ntl
Perfeito,obra de arte excepcional
Thank you for the masterpiece game! the graphic art,story line,soundtrack and gameplay it was great! i hope you make more game like this.
the cutest game i've ever tried
This game is so beautiful! I love the music and sound effects. Plus puzzles are good too. I was going to buy it on the PS4 but it's cheaper here. Even so it was 100% worth it.
It has horrible controls and gamepads aren't supported (yet?)
Absolutely perfect. One of the most sensible games that I finally can play.
It keeps closing the app during the section with the giant bird
Trất lượng :))

Soft and vibrant worlds, storyline is great! overall I loved it despite raging from time to time to get an achievement but overall it's a great game about a girl going through stages of grief, I understood her pain very much and I love how everything goes, to the smallest details to her voice, the music, everything is a delicance to hear.
BEAUTIFUL!, TOTALLY worth the price, Great adventure-puzzle game, Do yourself a favor and buy it!!!
I tried to play on my Asus C434 to no avail. Looks gorgeous but the controls don't work. Does anyone know why?
Still waiting for the game fix
This is such a great game! A masterpiece! but I think it is underrated. I do hope this wonderful game will be more popular!
Masterpiece.
Beautiful graphics, stunning visuals and art styles. Adore the music. 10/10 ign.

I loved the game,then when it came to the bird part I would get glitched from the game,then I would reopen it.I was shown the continue and new game screen. When I pressed continued game the whole process would repeat. Not worth getting until they fix this(if they even do).There is also no information to contact someone .I'm going to do some research to see if I can find someone.

When I'd seen the trailer for gris i was captivated instantly. Truly memorising, it's something else. Unfortunately there's a huge problem, I'm about half way through the red section and the game won't load. Not sure what to do. deleted/re-installed a few times but no go! Hope the Dev team have some ideas.

Genuinely one of the most amazing and beautiful games I have ever played. Design is breathtaking and the mysterious story had me on the edge of my seat. The whole experience is stunning, and the soundtrack gives me goosebumps. Absolutely worth every cent, if you're thinking of giving this game a go, definitely do it.
Surreal stunning beautiful gaming experience

Its good, worth the price(i think), but just a itsy bitsy problem. I can't finish the game . There's a cutscene were I just landed on the roof and the stars are aligning, it closes the app when the stars go up.

Good, unique, relaxing game. However, I can't help but compare it to other platforms. The gameplay on Switch is so much smoother compared to the Android version. It feels like it hovers around 26-30fps, good thing is mostly it's stable. Is there any chance of a high frame rate mode? I'm using a note 10+. A smoother gameplay would surely warrant a 5-star.
In my lifetime, I've only had a few games bring me to tears through sheer beauty. GRIS is now one of them.
STUNNING!!! Visually gorgeous and breathtaking. One of the most aesthetically pleasing game I've ever played on an Android. The gameplay is immersive and challenging. Worth the purchase!!!

It was a good game very nice sound track and very interesting concept but I'm not very patient but aside from that it was a very interesting experience, if only my inpatience hadn't ruined the experience
The most beautiful game I have ever played 🙌
Worked fine until the bird area, then it started crashing. Now it crashes as soon as I load the game. Would recommend if it worked - sadly it doesn't.
The controls absolutely suck. The area on the left side of the screen is too finicky. Trying to run or walk? You are constantly moving your finger to find it.
This game is beyond beautiful it's simply stunning and intricately indifferent.
Tragically beautiful and highly recommended!!!

Absolutely excellent traverse into the grieving process of death. The game play mechanics are excellent. Puzzles are nice and simple. Ran into some issues and they were operator error. Finishing this game brother me to tears and reminded me of when my grandmother died. Brought back some unresolved things I didn't know was there. I highly recommend this for anyone who has recently lose someone it even in the past. Very heart warming story and visuals. A+

Game kept crashing during the part with the bird. Tried completely uninstalling and reinstalling and nothing worked - and after buying the game. No option to contact anyone for support within the game.
Loved it!!! Not a typical game, you can't die, you don't fight anyone, just walk around, solve puzzles. But its so immersive, the visuals, the music, so emotional, I just couldn't stop playing.
Beautiful

Honestly even though I'm STILL at the process of downloading this game(at the moment) I'd still rate it 5 star cause I've seen many gameplays and I am mesmerize by the graphics and the storyline and even if my phone can't handle the graphics still 5 star
uwu
This game is beautiful so glad they ported it to Android
Stunning and atmospheric. Please add gamepad support and if possible fix the low fps.
very good example of its kind...but it's not my kind: wrong thumb twitch on 17th step of a series and you have to start all over.
I love this game.. I really hope this game update
The music, the graphics, and the gameplay are all just beautiful. I reccomend this breathtaking adventure to everyone!

Visual and music embrace. Deep and sad also peacefull. Masterpiece. A question! I missed one star from the beginning of swimming area(next to that big fish) then I got other 5 stars down of caves. but i can't return to back to get that star to activate the turtle. And game saved after I complete other 5 stars. What should I do?
One of the most beautiful games ever played

10 minutes into the game and I'm already in love with it! First few minutes tell you how much work was put into this one. The graphics are absolutely simple and mesmerizing at the same time. The music used had a soothing effect. The gameplay is smooth and very easy. Kudos to the devs!
So emotional. The music, the visuals, the story, all was perfect to me. Fully recommended. Great work!

Game Review: GRIS Gris is a platform-adventure game by Spanish indie developer Nomada Studio and published by Devolver Digital. The game can be played in Windows, macOS, Nintendo Switch, iOS, PlayStation 4 and recently, Android. Gris will remind us all again that video games are ART. Every step of your character takes will make you stop to appreciate the beauty of the art. Better prepare your screenshots—or much better, screen recorder with AUDIO (very important). STORY: 9/10 The game does not have any words or conversations for you to know what is happening. The colors, scenery, movements, and music are enough to deliver the message throughout the game. In the introduction, you will notice Gris's facial expression is somewhat sad and broken. There are no colors around her but black and white, thus giving you the impression of loneliness and longing. Although, there are parts that'll give you confusion like the little box creatures in the forest. GRAPHICS: 10/10 One word: ART. The scenes are painted with watercolor. As you progress through the game, you will encounter colors that give life to every scene in the game. For example, the first color to be encountered is RED. Almost, everything—even the sky—is painted with red. Red is an emotionally intense color. Gris might have felt very tensed or hurt from the very start. Then you will encounter other colors. As each color appears, you will begin to grasp Gris's emotions and her mission in the story. Be careful when playing in high brightness with your screen because of the colors from the screen are too intense for the eyes to take. Remember to take care of your eyes. So remember to know what each color and shape symbolizes because it will be very useful ANIMATION: 10/10 The animations are again: ART. Everything about this game is art. The animations are fluid and mesmerizing. Every frame in the animation will make your heart stop. Smooth animations in every small detail in this game is amazingly superb. The fishes are well-animated no matter how small they are. The same goes for the flower petals down the smallest particle. Even Gris's cloak is very well-animated. The transition of color in this game is so smooth and you could feel every color blending in. It's like you're not just playing the game also painting every step of the way. GAMEPLAY: 8/10 The gameplay is really simple since it is a platform adventure game. You need to solve puzzles and collect stars to complete a mission or get a new skill. At first, it seems like the usual run-and-jump platform adventure game but there is a lot of twist to it. Gris will receive different skills as the game progresses. There are a lot of puzzles in this game and each puzzle is unique and outstanding. What I don't like about it is that there are no hints for the next mission or what to do next. You pretty much have to guess everything by yourself on what to do first. The jump height for the gameplay is too short but later on, the game will give you a double-jump skill. OVERALL: 9.25/10 I have so much to say about this game but I want you to experience it. Just like the game, there are no words to explain it but the emotion that you feel says it all. Gris is such an amazing game and one of the best games that I've played this year.
